text: tatha yaad karo aad ke bhaee (hood[1]) ko. jab usane apanee jaati ko saavadhaan kiya, ahî€¼qaaf[2] mein, jabaki guzar chuke saavadhaan karane vaale (rasool) usake pahale aur usake pashchaat ki ibaadat (vandana) na karo allaah ke atirikt kee. main darata hoon tumapar, ek bade din kee yaatana se
